biography.value:
“The appearance of the tripart styrkvisnar terrifies anyone viewing it, but it's presence hints at a master even more terrifying.”

Monstrous Servant.

When a powerful being of great evil, such as a @creature[memori lich|GHMG], is created, residual power courses out into the world, changing and attracting nearby creatures. One such result is a styrkvisnar, a monster appearing to be part wolf, part eagle, and part seal.

Corrupt Connection.

Styrkvisnars bond with potent evil beings, becoming servants and scouts. Such a bond takes 24 hours to establish. Once the bond forms, the styrkvisnar makes every effort to carry out the wishes of its new master. It uses its shapechanger ability to accomplish tasks for which a monstrous form won't do.

Salvage p326[–]

Someone who has proficiency with @item[leatherworker's tools|PHB] can fashion the hide of a styrkvisnar into a @item[cloak of therianthropy|GHMG] [...]. Doing so takes 10 days, other materials worth 2,000 gp, and a successful [[/save ability=intelligence dc=15]] or Wisdom check.

Lore p326[–]

[[/save ability=intelligence dc=10]] (&Reference[skill=History]):

A styrkvisnar is a monstrous blend of a wolf, eagle, and seal. It can shapechange into a humanoid.

[[/save ability=intelligence dc=15]] (&Reference[skill=Arcana]):

Styrkvisnars are created by or attracted to the welling of power at points where mighty and wicked creatures permanently transform into a monstrous being, such as a lich. The styrkvisnar serves the reborn being.

languages.custom: up to three languages (can't speak in hybrid form)

description.value: If in hybrid form, the styrkvisnar makes one bite attack, one tail attack, and one attack with its talons. In humanoid form, the styrkvisnar makes three attacks, either unarmed or with a weapon.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]]{+6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ([[/damage 2d4 + 3 type=piercing]]) damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]]{+6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ([[/damage 1d8 + 3 type=bludgeoning]]) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save ability=strength dc=14]] saving throw or fall &Reference[condition=prone].
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]]{+6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ([[/damage 2d4 + 3 type=slashing]]) damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]]{+6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ([[/damage 1d8 + 3 type=bludgeoning]]) damage.

The styrkvisnar roars, unleashing thunder in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=14]] saving throw, taking 27 ([[/damage 6d8 type=thunder]]) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The roar is audible over 1 mile.
The styrkvisnar has proficiency with improvised, martial, and simple weapons.
The styrkvisnar can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
The styrkvisnar has advantage on Wisdom (&Reference[skill=Perception]) checks that rely on hearing, sight, or smell.
If the styrkvisnar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

activation.condition: If the styrkvisnar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

description.value: The styrkvisnar can use its action to polymorph into the form of a Medium humanoid or back into its true form, which is a hybrid of eagle, seal, and wolf. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
The styrkvisnar attacks once.
The styrkvisnar can move up to its speed in any mode available to it. This movement doesn't provoke @action[opportunity attack|PHB|opportunity attacks].

The styrkvisnar can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The styrkvisnar regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

  • @UUID[Actor.66hXtIsWJPTDMlJE.Item.nplVdp03BZzHKnsf]{Attack}
  • @UUID[Actor.66hXtIsWJPTDMlJE.Item.PVyjK5BNn9FxSPyY]{Move}
